element.definition: Describes the action that was taken or the observation that was made that reduces/eliminates the risk associated with the identified issue.
element.comments: The "text" component can be used for detail or when no appropriate code exists.

binding.description: Codes describing steps taken to resolve the issue or other circumstances that mitigate the risk associated with the issue; e.g. 'added concurrent therapy', 'prior therapy documented', etc.
